title: Man with Lance Riding through the Snow

thumbnail.alt_text: A hunched figure on horseback holds a thin shaft as he makes his way through windy, snowy weather suggested by strokes of white, gray, and brown.

publication_history:

exhibition_history: The Arts Club of Chicago, The Horse as Motif, 1200 B.C. – 1966 A.D., January 15–February 22, 1975, cat. 52.
provenance_text: Henry Field (died 1890), Chicago; his widow Mrs. Florence Lathrop Field; given to the Art Institute, 1894.
